Beaver Creek Mini Storage in Farmington, NY has the highest security in the area:

  • Fenced. Our security fence surrounds the entire property in order to secure your possessions.
  • Sliding Security Gate with your own unique access code.
  • A dozen high-resolution security cameras that record all motion 24/7

Call (585) 398-3380 anytime for personalized service We will be more than happy to answer your questions and to make an appointment to show you our facility.

Our self storage units have:

  • Insulated ceilings
  • Raised, sealed concrete floors. That means your unit is ALWAYS dry.
  • Convenient access. Just drive right up to your unit.
  • Dust free asphalt driveway. The asphalt slopes away from your unit keeping rain and melting snow away from your stored items.
  • Pest and rodent control
